EmailTemplate.description: Email Users informing them of a new SFDC support person
EmailTemplate.name: NewSupportPerson
EmailTemplate.subject: New Contact Person
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Salesforce.com User,
Until further notice, please contact Tom Barrett (thomas.barrett@carefirst.com) for Salesforce.com support.
Thank you, Sales Project Management & System Support (SPM&SS)
